biotools.summary: Suite of computational tools for the analysis of multilocus sequence typing data. Input DNA sequence files are analyzed to provide allele calls, and to characterize the specific sequence type and clonal complex of the Neisseria meningitidis strain.

bioschemas.name: MGIP
bioschemas.summary: Suite of computational tools for the analysis of multilocus sequence typing data. Input DNA sequence files are analyzed to provide allele calls, and to characterize the specific sequence type and clonal complex of the Neisseria meningitidis strain.
